duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform welding and cutting of metals to predetermined sizes and tolerances.
Use measuring skills to determine the center of an object and accurately read a measuring tape.
Operate and perform preventative maintenance on overhead crane, forklift, and welding/cutting equipment.
Safely use overhead crane to position product for welding or grinding.
Perform routing machine operations, feeding or unloading a machine, and assisting workers by holding materials or tools.
Pass a 1G flat weld certification test using GMAW and maintain certification.
Safely operate band saw for cutting raw material products according to drawing.
Comply with safety policies and procedures, and perform other duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Valmont endorsed 1G flat weld certification test
Six months of previous hands-on welding experience in a professional environment
